item.title: Reconciling Configuration Management and Immutable Infrastructure
item.description: This Calm.io blog recap was originally written and posted by me on May 26, 2016 at http://calm.io/2016/05/26/reconciling-configuration-management-and-immutable-infrastructure/, and slightly enhanced on February 18, 2018.
